1.text: You walk into a dark room and find yourself face to face with a dungeon Guardian.

2.text: You run down a dark tunnel when suddenly a dungeon Guardian approaches you.

3.text: You turn the corner into a dark room and find yoursel facing against three little goblins.

4.text: You enter a dark room, when suddenly a shadow leaps onto you from behind.

5.text: You enter a darkened corridor as a crazed bandit runs at you at full speed.

6.text: You turn the corner and find yourself squared against eight little elves.

7.text: You enter the room and just barely dodge an arrow from an enemy archer.
